title: Baby Carrier
description: two upper corner panels embroidered in geometric design in pink, light green and black on canvas; two lower corners embroidered in floral design in magenta, blue and light green on dark indigo field; center panel embroidered in geometric design in black, pink and green on canvas with red side binding; open at top
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
